mapper.insert: insert into todo(user_no, category, title, description, start_date, due_date) values(#{userno}, 'default', #{title},#{description}, #{startdate}, #{duedate})
mapper.delete: delete from todo where user_no = #{userno} and title = #{title}
update todo set deleted = 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select t.no as no, t.user_no as userNo, category, title, date_format(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') startdate, date_format(due_date,'%Y-%m-%d') duedate, description , ifnull(a.is_success,0) as issuccess from todo t left outer join achievement a on t.no = a.todo_no and date(a.success_date) = CURDATE() where t.user_no = #{userno} and t.deleted = 0 and CURDATE() <= date(t.due_date)
select * from todo where title = #{title} and user_no = #{userno} and deleted = 0
